name: Headband
description: A decorative or functional band worn around the head.

name: Mask
description: A face covering that can conceal identity or provide protection.

name: Amulet
description: A protective charm worn around the neck.

name: Brooch
description: A decorative pin worn at the neck or chest.

name: Scarf
description: A length of fabric worn around the neck for warmth or style.

name: Cape
description: A sleeveless cloak worn over the shoulders.

name: Cloak
description: A loose outer garment worn over other clothing.

name: Mantle
description: A ceremonial cloak worn as a symbol of authority.

name: Robe
description: A long, loose-fitting garment worn as outer clothing.

name: Tunic
description: A simple garment worn on the upper body.

name: Bracers
description: Protective guards worn on the forearms.

name: Bracelets
description: Decorative bands worn around the wrists.

name: Gloves
description: Hand coverings that provide protection or dexterity.

name: Ring
description: A circular band worn on the finger.

name: Belt
description: A strap worn around the waist to hold clothing or equipment.

name: Sash
description: A band of cloth worn around the waist or over the shoulder.

name: Girdle
description: A belt or cord worn around the waist.

name: Boots
description: Sturdy footwear that reaches above the ankle.

name: Sandals
description: Open footwear secured by straps.

name: Shoes
description: Enclosed footwear that covers the entire foot.
